name: nitsan/ns-all-chat
description: One of the only TYPO3 extension which provides to use most popular chat tool at your website. This TYPO3 extension provides to configure many live chat tools eg., zopim.com, livechatinc.com, purechat.com, livezilla.net, clickdesk.com, tidiochat.com, visitlead.com, onwebchat.com, userlike.com, hipchat.com etc. Live-Demo: https://demo.t3terminal.com/t3t-extensions/ You can download PRO version for more-features & free-support at https://t3terminal.com/typo3-all-in-one-chat-plugin-free/
